page.title: 06PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Budge}is a game where you can have as many people as you want to play. One person is "on" and the others have a base. They have to run to a certain place and touch it without being caught. Then they have to run back down to their base and tell the other people in the base to budge. Then it is their go. In{Tiggy Free,}one person is "on" and the rest stand on the wall and the one that's "on" counts to five and you run out. He tigs you, you run out to the tree and the other people tig you and you are free.If you are caught three times you are "on". In{1,2,3 Not On}_ there is a base where someone counts to 100. The rest hide. When he has counted, if he sees anyone, he shouts his or her name.
